cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT,)f 2).....18.Ja january, 1942.COPY NO.31STAR CABINET.THE MINISTERIAL COMMITTEE ON EXPORTSURPLUSlsn : "Note by the Secretary of the War Cabinet,The Minister without Portfolio has decided, that,owing to the changed position in regard to Export Surpluses,it is no longer necessary to retain the Ministerial Committeeon Export Surpluses, which was set up in August, 19400The Official Committee on Export Surpluses willcontinue under the Chairmanship of Sir Frederick Leith-Ross,and such of its conclusions or submissions as require to he discussed by Ministers will in future normally he consideredby the Ministerial Committee on Economic Aspects of reconstruction Prohlemse(Signed) Ea E,BRIDGES0Secretary, of the War Cabinet,,'eat George Street, S.W.T.10th January, 1942.
